function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deficiencies in health, comfort, and eco-friendliness features in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation, discomfort, and environmental issues","Mitigation":"Implementing pandemic-resilient indicators, improving green building certification systems, and addressing sustainability subcategories","Technologies":"Green building certification systems, sustainable design and construction practices","People":"Residents, building occupants, and communities","Owner":"Architects, builders, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate response to pandemic-resilient indicators in existing green building certification systems","Impact":"Limited ability to ensure pandemic-resilience in residential buildings, potential for increased disease propagation and discomfort","Mitigation":"Adopting necessary changes to existing green building certification systems, developing all-new standards, and addressing subcategories such as waste and wastewater management","Technologies":"Sustainable design and construction practices, pandemic-resilient indicators","People":"Architects, builders, and sustainability assessors","Owner":"Government agencies, sustainability organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in approach to residential buildings among green building certification systems","Impact":"Inconsistent coverage of pandemic-resilient indicators, potential for variability in pandemic-resilience of different residential buildings","Mitigation":"Adopting standardized criteria for pandemic-resilient indicators, addressing limitations in existing standards, and developing new standards for multi-family residences","Technologies":"Standardized assessment criteria, sustainable design and construction practices","People":"Architects, builders, and sustainability assessors","Owner":"Government agencies, sustainability organizations"}]}
